Package org.pepstock.charba.client.events

Interface ChartEventHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnimationCompleteEventHandler, AnimationProgressEventHandler, AxisClickEventHandler, AxisEnterEventHandler, AxisHoverEventHandler, AxisLeaveEventHandler, ChartClickEventHandler, ChartHoverEventHandler, ChartResizeEventHandler, DatasetRangeCleanSelectionEventHandler, DatasetRangeSelectionEventHandler, DatasetSelectionEventHandler, LegendClickEventHandler, LegendHoverEventHandler, LegendLeaveEventHandler, SubtitleClickEventHandler, SubtitleEnterEventHandler, SubtitleLeaveEventHandler, TitleClickEventHandler, TitleEnterEventHandler, TitleLeaveEventHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtLeastOneDatasetHandler
    public interface ChartEventHandler
extends EventHandler
    Common interface for all chart event handlers, used to recognize when the chart event handlers (and only the chart ones) have been activated.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
